com.salimov.yurii

Class ScanLength

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.algoritm.ScanLength
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScanLength

    public final class ScanLength
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScanLength
    The class describes a method for scanning the length of a train with a input stream. The value is entered by the user.

        public int scan()
        Scans the length of a train with a input stream. The user enters a value as long as the length is greater than zero.
